}} "'Complicated'" is the title of a song co-written and recorded by Canadian
country music singer Carolyn Dawn Johnson. It was released in April 2001 the
second single from her 2001 debut album [[Room with a View (album)|Room with a
View]]. The song was also her second entry on two U.S. singles charts, peaking
at number 5 on [[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]] Hot Country Singles & Tracks
(now Hot Country Songs) and number 59 on the Billboard Hot 100. It also reached
#15 on that magazine's Hot Adult Contemporary Tracks chart.
categories: Songs written by Carolyn Dawn Johnson
